      Checks if player has won by checking win condition:
      p.getPoints() >= BattleshipBoard.SHIP_AMOUNT

      Method to set up a player on the board.
      private boolean BattleshipBoard.setGrenade(Coord c, Player p)
      Method which sets the content of the given coordinate to Content.GRENADE which is owned by the given player.

    • Uses of Player in com.absynth.battleship.players

      Classes in com.absynth.battleship.players that implement Player 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Computer
      Represents a computer Player of the BattleshipBoard.
      class  PlayerAdapter
      Provides a general adapter for Player class to implement some of the basic features every player must have, such as id, points and skipped turns.
      class  User
      Represents a human Player of the BattleshipBoard game.
